summary: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.
cast: Dolores Avery|Steven Avery|Laura Nirider|Ken Kratz|Kathleen Zellner|Brendan Dassey|Len Kachinsky|Sandra Greenman|Danielle Ricciardi|Laura Ricciardi|John Wolfe|Peter Dassey|Barb Tadych
director: Stars: Dolores Avery, Steven Avery, Laura Nirider | See full cast & crew Â»
title: Making a Murderer
